headline: Evergy to Conduct 2025 Shareholders Meeting Online
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo., April 15, 2025--On Tuesday, May 6, 2025, Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) will conduct its 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders. The virtual meeting will begin at 11:00 a.m. Eastern (10:00 a.m. Central) and can be accessed at www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/EVRG2025. To participate, all shareholders must enter the control number found on their proxy cards or voting instruction forms. At the meeting, shareholders will vote to elect 12 members of the Board of Directors and other busi
